column1: Kata Robata////We liked their miso marinated black cod and kakuni pork belly. They were delicious. However
column2: their unagi roll is mediocre at best
column3: I would give 3.5 stars if possible since I like their ambiance
column4: service and food so far. We will definitely go back again to try their sea urchin pasta
column6: uni chawanmushi and lobster mac$&cheese. Oh yes
column7: will have to try their robata dishes as well in future.
